item.title: Improve visibility in Helm workflows with Werf!
item.description: What’s the most annoying thing about Helm workflows? There’s literally no visibility during the deployment process. Do you have some migration (Helm) hook that’s failing? Helm will tell you that one of the hooks failed but all the kubectling is up to. And that’s just fine, Helm is too complex even without some live tailing of the deployment process.
